div.head: 傷寒表虛
div.div: harm caused by cold with external depletion

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: harm caused by cold with external depletion

sense.def: Pathological Condition of shang han 傷寒 , harm caused by cold, with signs such as sweating and an aversion to wind, as well as slowed movement in the vessels. Ben cao yan yi 本草衍義 Substance Entry gui 桂：張仲景桂枝湯治傷寒表虛，皆須此藥，是專用辛甘之意也 , “Zhang Zhongjing’s decoction with gui zhi for the treatment of harm caused by cold with external depletion is required in all cases where it is meaningful to apply especially acrid and sweet [flavor qualities]”.
